article.contents:
Legacy is a concept encompassion your physical and spiritual ancestry, your upbringing, any Destiny or Fate mystically appointed to you, magic items bequeathed unto you or in fact stumbled over...quite a lot, really.
It replaces and supercedes the concept of "race" in traditional TTRPGs, and uses the existing rules for [Feats](../Feats) and [Powers](../Powers).
See the [working document](</system8/Legacy/Legacy (working document).md>) for now.
